package.author: Morgan Quigley, Brian Gerkey and Kevin Watts

description.brief: Monitors a joystick and sends its state

package.description:
This package contains two nodes. The oldest is "joy", maintained only for backwards compatibility. New code and launch files should use "txjoy", which follows the current (0.6) ROS API.
The ps3_joy node uses the PS3 SIXAXIS joystick. This node is very similar to the txjoy node, but the PS3 joystick uses a different default range for its axes. All PS3 joysticks must use this node.
